title: Soraka bot standing under tower and doing absolutely NOTHING all game
body: So, I was doing a custom bots game on Twisted treeline. I was jungling, and I  let Soraka and Kayle hold the lanes. It wasn't for the entire game, but for a significant portion of the game, Soraka bot just sat at our tower doing absolutely nothing. Sometimes after she got killed, she would go somewhere else and do the same thing. Also, there were small periods of time where she followed us around and helped us teamfight, but for the most part she just sat there. I wish I had a video of this, but unfortunately I do not. Will be happy to answer any questions.

replies.body:
I think it is an issue with the Twisted Treeline.
Soraka Bot works on Summoner's Rift, but I never tried her on TT.

Jinx and Fizz bot don't work on the Twisted Treeline either, but I think they might be able to work on Summoner's Rift. Although I never tried it.
Hey Cloud273, thanks for the report! Looks like we have a lead as to what's going on with this, but we're going to continue investigating. :)
Report Soraka for AFK. GG these trolls.
